Subjects: sermons, verse in; Christ, Passion of; songs
_description: Praise to Christ in a passion sermon on Amore langueo (for John of Bromyard) — two couplets

CULKk424.Transcription:
Synge ȝe a new songefor hym þat deyde for vs wyt
                    wrongeffor þys day wonder he wrouȝthOn þe roode
                    þer he vs bowȝth
